channel.title: Abouts on Kiss My Shiny Hugo Site

item.title: Circum Vitae
item.description: Novosibirsk, Russia lispnik@gmail.com https://github.com/monoid Job experience Leading software engineer, Semrush Jan 2020-Oct 2021, Saint-Peterburg, Russia In a team developing a WWW crawler, I was responsible for scheduler part that determined when and how often each page is be crawled subject to different real-time limitations. By improving the scheduling algorithms, increased output rate by 40% obeying all the limitations, and reduced workload to rarely-updated websites. Also worked on improving Semrush’s custom Pagerank implementation.
